segments.text: Good morning . I came in answer to your advertisement for a salesperson .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Will you walk this way , please ? What experience have you had ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I haven't had any experience in just this sort of work . I'm studying business administration in college . I want to get a job that would tie in with my studies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got any selling experience at all ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I worked in a department store in a small town last summer vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now tell me about your educational background .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I graduated from Beijing University . I majored in business administration .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What courses have you completed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The courses I completed are marketing , business law , business English , statistics , marketing principles , sales management , distribution theory , economies and psychology .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What subjects did you like most at university ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I liked sales strategies most .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why would you like to work with us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's an interesting job , and your company is one of the best known . Although I have no work experience as a salesperson , the job description you sent was very interesting . It's a job I've been dreaming of when I was at university .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are your future plans and what kind of expectations do you have of the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have an interest in marketing and I would consider graduate study in business in the future . I think my goals will become more clear as I gain experience in sales and marketing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . Do you know anything about this company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , a little . As you mentioned just now , yours is an American capital company . As far as I know your company is a world famous one which produces cosmetics and skincare products .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got anything to ask me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will traveling be required in this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How often ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three times a year at most . How do you feel about this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine .
segments.speaker: S1
